solution.introduction: Please remember that you were not expected to come up with the exact same solution. It is just a good example.
solution.sample: The book is about a guy called Bilbo. One day, he gets some unexpected visitors: Gandalf, the wizard and nine dwarfs. Some of them had strange names such as Gloin or Dori.Together, they go on an adventure and try to retrieve a treasure from Smaug, an old dragon. Bilbo somewhat betrays the dwarfs, but still is the hero. Bilbo is a good guy.

options.feedbackMissed: To summarize the book, you should really mention the main character by name at least once.
Did you possibly forget to mention what a certain Wizard did?

options.feedbackIncluded: Great, you even remembered the dragon's name!
Great! You seem to have named one of the dwarfs!

overallFeedback.feedback: Hmm, maybe you should read the book again?
Great! You really seem to know some thing about The Hobbit!
You're kind of a fantasy nerd, right?

notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
taskDescription: Please describe the novel "The Hobbit" by J.R.R. Tolkien with at least 100 characters and up to 500 characters.
placeholderText: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit ...
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
